item.description:
Dear Prospective Improvisers,

In this reunion of sorts, we will pick up where we left off. We will review the improv basics, skills which no matter one's level or experience, require periodic attention. We will do the warmups, drills, and self-evaluation necessary to elevate our thinking and sharpen our impulses. We will practice a few games. Plan for a good afternoon of improvisational theater!

Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Casting Call Rehearsal
